notes.title: Mary's Christmas wishlist...
notes.content:
For Christmas, apparently Mary wants :

-Bear Grylls hunting knife
-John Wayne's end of the world survival kit
-Water resistant walking shoes
-6 months worth of food and water supplies
-A bionicle robot toy
-A first aid kit
-A water purifier

I think she might be a bit young for the Bionicle though...

notes.title: About axNote
notes.content:
This is my version of a simple react note taking app in ReactJS. I mainly wanted to train my React skills and test out new functionalities.

A few thing that you can do with this app :
-Add and/or edit notes, each with a title, a content and optional tags.
-Delete a note
-Filter the notes panel by search
-Filter the notes panel by tags
-Add new tags
-Be warned if you didn't save your note

Anyway, you can try it by yourself !

Github :
https://github.com/axeldadure/axnote

notes.title: Stupid ideas of useless apps
notes.content:
Unordered:

-An app that matches you with a dog from a shelter based on your preferences
-An app that calculates exactly how much food and which type to get in case of an end of the world scenario
-A calculator that always gives you -1 or +1 on the answer but you don't know which one
-A note taking app in ReactJS
-An app that create actual readable and funny random content like Lorem Ipsum so that I don't have to type this myself
